item.title: Flytipping yet again at the start of Langley Road, Beckenham, 8th August
item.description:
Flytipping yet again at the start of Langley Road, Beckenham!! Please can the Council address this ongoing problem with this particular road!!! This is regularly being reported and some of our Council Tax must be spent on resolving this issue once and for all!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langley Road, Elmers End, London

item.title: Communal walk way lighting on wall not working, 8th August
item.description:
Wall light for communal walk way in front of Cottage Walk block is not working. Resulting in the front of the houses be in complete darkness at night. Making it very dangers at night to see where you are going and making easy to be attacked or robbed.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cottage Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Branch hanging over footpath, 8th August
item.description:
A branch is hanging over the footpath that runs parallel between Chislehurst Road and the tennis courts. It is completely blocking this footpath down to floor level. The path is used to get to and from Queen Maryâ€™s Hospital. The best description for the position is with the tennis courts on your left walking towards the hospital it is where the footpath makes a short right turn to meet up with Chislehurst Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chislehurst Road, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lg table, 8th August
item.description:

item.title: Business waste, 8th August
item.description:
